headline.main: RAF'S JUNE BLOWS PUT AT 15,800 TONS; Three 2,000-Ton Raids Among Fourteen Major Attacks -- Final Day Is Quiet

lead_paragraph: LONDON, July 1 (U.P.) -- British-based bombers of the Royal Air Force, blasting Axis targets from Germany to Italy in the greatest month of the unparalelled air offensive, dropped a record-breaking total of more than 15,800 tons of bombs on Europe in June, a recapitulation showed today.
abstract: rept on gasoline used in big RAF raid
